docs.snippet: The latest monthly collection of stories about young people published in The New York Times....
docs.lead_paragraph: In this monthly feature we try to collect everything published in The Times about young people so you can find it in one handy spot. For ideas on how to use this series in your classroom, visit our lesson “Teaching With ‘Teenagers in The Times’”.
docs.abstract: The latest monthly collection of stories about young people published in The New York Times.
